metadata.title: CVE-2022-48903 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:btrfs: fix relocation crash due to premature return frombtrfs_commit_transaction()We are seeing crashes similar to the following trace:[38.969182] WARNING: CPU: 20 PID: 2105 at fs/btrfs/relocation.c:4070btrfs_relocate_block_group+0x2dc/0x340 [btrfs][38.973556] CPU: 20 PID: 2105 Comm: btrfs Not tainted 5.17.0-rc4 #54[38.974580] Hardware name: QEMU Standard PC (i440FX + PIIX, 1996), BIOSrel-1.12.0-59-gc9ba5276e321-prebuilt.qemu.org 04/01/2014[38.976539] RIP: 0010:btrfs_relocate_block_group+0x2dc/0x340 [btrfs][38.980336] RSP: 0000:ffffb0dd42e03c20 EFLAGS: 00010206[38.981218] RAX: ffff96cfc4ede800 RBX: ffff96cfc3ce0000 RCX:000000000002ca14[38.982560] RDX: 0000000000000000 RSI: 4cfd109a0bcb5d7f RDI:ffff96cfc3ce0360[38.983619] RBP: ffff96cfc309c000 R08: 0000000000000000 R09:0000000000000000[38.984678] R10: ffff96cec0000001 R11: ffffe84c80000000 R12:ffff96cfc4ede800[38.985735] R13: 0000000000000000 R14: 0000000000000000 R15:ffff96cfc3ce0360[38.987146] FS:  00007f11c15218c0(0000) GS:ffff96d6dfb00000(0000)knlGS:0000000000000000[38.988662] CS:  0010 DS: 0000 ES: 0000 CR0: 0000000080050033[38.989398] CR2: 00007ffc922c8e60 CR3: 00000001147a6001 CR4:0000000000370ee0[38.990279] DR0: 0000000000000000 DR1: 0000000000000000 DR2:0000000000000000[38.991219] DR3: 0000000000000000 DR6: 00000000fffe0ff0 DR7:0000000000000400[38.992528] Call Trace:[38.992854]  <TASK>[38.993148]  btrfs_relocate_chunk+0x27/0xe0 [btrfs][38.993941]  btrfs_balance+0x78e/0xea0 [btrfs][38.994801]  ? vsnprintf+0x33c/0x520[38.995368]  ? __kmalloc_track_caller+0x351/0x440[38.996198]  btrfs_ioctl_balance+0x2b9/0x3a0 [btrfs][38.997084]  btrfs_ioctl+0x11b0/0x2da0 [btrfs][38.997867]  ? mod_objcg_state+0xee/0x340[38.998552]  ? seq_release+0x24/0x30[38.999184]  ? proc_nr_files+0x30/0x30[38.999654]  ? call_rcu+0xc8/0x2f0[39.000228]  ? __x64_sys_ioctl+0x84/0xc0[39.000872]  ? btrfs_ioctl_get_supported_features+0x30/0x30 [btrfs][39.001973]  __x64_sys_ioctl+0x84/0xc0[39.002566]  do_syscall_64+0x3a/0x80[39.003011]  entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x44/0xae[39.003735] RIP: 0033:0x7f11c166959b[39.007324] RSP: 002b:00007fff2543e998 EFLAGS: 00000246 ORIG_RAX:0000000000000010[39.008521] RAX: ffffffffffffffda RBX: 00007f11c1521698 RCX:00007f11c166959b[39.009833] RDX: 00007fff2543ea40 RSI: 00000000c4009420 RDI:0000000000000003[39.011270] RBP: 0000000000000003 R08: 0000000000000013 R09:00007f11c16f94e0[39.012581] R10: 0000000000000000 R11: 0000000000000246 R12:00007fff25440df3[39.014046] R13: 0000000000000000 R14: 00007fff2543ea40 R15:0000000000000001[39.015040]  </TASK>[39.015418] ---[ end trace 0000000000000000 ]---[43.131559] ------------[ cut here ]------------[43.132234] kernel BUG at fs/btrfs/extent-tree.c:2717![43.133031] invalid opcode: 0000 [#1] PREEMPT SMP PTI[43.133702] CPU: 1 PID: 1839 Comm: btrfs Tainted: G        W5.17.0-rc4 #54[43.134863] Hardware name: QEMU Standard PC (i440FX + PIIX, 1996), BIOSrel-1.12.0-59-gc9ba5276e321-prebuilt.qemu.org 04/01/2014[43.136426] RIP: 0010:unpin_extent_range+0x37a/0x4f0 [btrfs][43.139913] RSP: 0000:ffffb0dd4216bc70 EFLAGS: 00010246[43.140629] RAX: 0000000000000000 RBX: ffff96cfc34490f8 RCX:0000000000000001[43.141604] RDX: R12:0000000041d00000[43.144657] R13: ffff96cfc3ce0000 R14: ffffb0dd4216bd08 R15:0000000000000000[43.145686] FS:  00007f7657dd68c0(0000) GS:ffff96d6df640000(0000)knlGS:0000000000000000[43.146808] CS: DR2:0000000000000000[43.149581] DR3: 0000000000000000 DR6: 00000000fffe0ff0 DR7: 00000000000---truncated---

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-23-generic - 5.15.0-23.23
linux-image-5.15.0-23-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-23-generic - 5.15.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-23-generic-64k - 5.15.0-23.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1004-kvm - 5.15.0-1004.4
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

Available for NVIDIA BlueField platforms

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-gcp - 5.15.0-1003.6
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-23.23').
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
